titleStmt.title: Methodus de conscribendis epistolis a Georgio Macropedio secundùm veram artis rationem tradita ; eiusdem epitome præceptionum de paranda copia verborum & rerum, per quæstiones ; item de nouem speciebus argumentationum rhetoricarum, rem omnem breuiter explicans ; accessit Christophori Hegendorphini epistolas Conscribendi methoduss.
titleStmt.author: Macropedius, Georgius, 1487-1558.
Hegendorph, Christoph, 1500-1540. Methodus conscribendi epistolas.

editionStmt.edition: Hac editione longè quàm anteà emendatior.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
